# Bookmark App
## *by ZenMnky*
<br />
<br />
<br />

## Description

An API-powered Bookmarks application that lets the user store and rate their custom web bookmarks

## User Stories

As a user:

- I can add bookmarks to my bookmark list. Bookmarks contain: âœ”ï¸
    - title âœ”ï¸
    - url link âœ”ï¸
    - description âœ”ï¸
    - rating (1-5) âœ”ï¸
- I can see a list of my bookmarks when I first open the app âœ”ï¸

- All bookmarks in the list default to a "condensed" view showing only title and rating âœ”ï¸

- I can click on a bookmark to display the "detailed" view âœ”ï¸

- Detailed view expands to additionally display description and a "Visit Site" link âœ”ï¸

- I can remove bookmarks from my bookmark list âœ”ï¸

- I receive appropriate feedback when I cannot submit a bookmark âœ”ï¸

-  I can select from a dropdown a "minimum rating" to filter the list by all bookmarks rated at or above the chosen selection âœ”ï¸

-  (Extension feature - optional) I can edit the rating and description of a bookmark in my list â¬œ

## Technical Requirements
- Use jQuery for AJAX and DOM manipulation âœ”ï¸
- Use namespacing to adhere to good architecture practices  âœ”ï¸
    - Minimal global variables âœ”ï¸
    - Create modules in separate files to organize your code âœ”ï¸
    - Logically group your functions âœ”ï¸
- Keep your Data out of the DOM âœ”ï¸
    - No direct DOM manipulation in your event handlers âœ”ï¸
    - Follow the React-ful design pattern - change your state, re-render your component âœ”ï¸
- Use semantic HTML âœ”ï¸
- Use responsive design âœ”ï¸
    - Visually and functionally solid in viewports for mobile and desktop âœ”ï¸
- Follow a11y best practices ğŸš§ *still need to run through validator*
- (Extension) Follow AJAX and a11y best practices
